website_summaries.verdict: The wireless, exercise-friendly Sony MDR-XB80BS earphones deliver thunderous bass, but lack the high-mid definition that allows for balance.
pros: Powerful bass response doesn't distort at high volumes
cons: Control panel could be laid out more usefully

customer_reviews.title: Normal in ear headphones falling out? Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: If your one of those people who lose the ear headphones (Apple) with the slightest movements then you should go for this ones! In my previous gym workouts, I used in ear headphone but I had to adjust them all the time. These however, sits very well and I can focus on my workout. Yes they are expensive, but It's worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Virk

customer_reviews.title: Great sport headphones, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones. They dont budge regardless of what type of workout Im doing. And there is no issue with the bluetooth connection dropping temporarily when I move my phone around. Prior to these I had Jaybird X3s. These Sony headphones are far superior in terms of sound quality, fit and price.
customer_reviews.author: TheSwayzeTrain

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fall off from ears. Sound is avarage not the best. I had to return it as it didn't last up to a year, the wire that connects the 2 earphones got internally damaged (like wired earphones) then one of the earphones stopped working. What a stupid design! The manufacturer doesn't do refunds only repairs so basically you get the same rubbish product. I strongly recommend purchasing the extra 2 years damage cover from amazon if you chose this product, as you can get your money back with it. It is way too expensive to get spoilt within that short period of time! So I would NOT recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Krisztina Nguefack

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and great fit
customer_reviews.text: These are the best gym headphones I have ever had, and I've had a lot. Sound quality is superb with Sony's ldac connection and bass is very good. Only downside is that they need frequent charging when using ldac and listening at high volume. They fit my ears perfectly but the neck cable is a bit stiff and the adjustment mechanism could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound not so good battery management!
customer_reviews.text: I found the sound to be excellent but surly that is to be expected of Sony. What is not expected or excellent is the battery life and no indication verbal or otherwise of remaining battery life, simply a recharge battery announcement and cut off. Not a product I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect training headphones
customer_reviews.text: I think these are one of the best training headphones. I am writing this review after using them for about 6 months Pros: -excellent sound with rich bass -easy connection by NFC -the buttons are easy to use -they do not fall out and also look great -battery life is decent (I charge them every 3-4 workouts which means they last about 4 hours for me on almost maximum volume and LDAC) Cons: -The attachment which holds the wires on the back is really annoying (doesn't really manage to keep the wires snug).
customer_reviews.author: Alex N

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: These work great however if your phone is in your pocket of a heavy coat the signal does get a bit dodgey, they do feel comfortable to wear but the part that goes behind your ear is very thick and subconsciously I would be worried they would cause your ears to stick out permenantly after prolonged use, speaking on the phone works perfectly and when working out they will stay in your ear perfectly even when skipping rope.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but rubbish battery life
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased at first. Worked brilliant through ldac on my zx300 Walkman. Big but: had to recharge it every 2 hours so never got the advertised 7 hours life. Wouldn't even minded half the life Sony claimed. I can't live with hassle of recharging everyday and to get an immediate "battery low" voice message to only instantly turn off! Returned for a refund
customer_reviews.author: iain1975

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor sound quality. Battery life seems ok, but no battery life indicator: just announces it needs a recharge then switches off. Comfortable: don't really notice that they are there.
customer_reviews.author: robaker

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound, very comfortable, great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the sound quality, I have used this for 1.5 years without any decrease in battery life which was great, but the only downside is that they warn of low battery only when it is already to late to recharge them. The bluetooth connection sometimes takes some time to establish and can be a bit shaky when it is windy, but I don't think this is down to the product. Overall I would fully recommend this, I was fed up with breaking cables and having a bluetooth headphones is really a great solution, especially when use this every day.
customer_reviews.author: ldent

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be Better
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my partner. He loved it & wore it to the gym as it was the ideal headphones for training. However, 6 months later they just stopped working for no reason. Although it was in Warranty, finding another pair that he like a as much as these ones as been hell.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the bass
customer_reviews.text: Use them while working out, I love the bass, it gives me an extra kick when listening to music which motivates me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good set of headphones, excellent sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good set of headphones that work well in the gym. Excellent sound quality with very good bass. I had to change to the larger earbud size to get the best out of them though. Connection is very easy to my iPhone. They can be a little uncomfortable over a long period hence not 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LargeRobin

customer_reviews.title: Good but not Great
customer_reviews.text: Good sound with plenty of bass but not that great a fit. Gets a little wobbly and slippery with a bit of sweat!!
customer_reviews.author: Santimo

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing battery life
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and they're comfortable. The reason I am only giving 3 stars is because the battery life is rubbish and nothing like the 7 hours advertised. Mine seem to last 1.5 - 2 hours. Get into the habit of charging after each workout. Another bugbear is that there is no advance warning that the battery is low. You just get a brief message telling you to recharge then they switch off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality and extra bass good, broke after a few months as headset will not charge. Tried everything, inc. Factory reset and initializing. Only option now is to get then repaired, which will cost as much as the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Miss G

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant. I never do a gym session without these
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. I never do a gym session without these. By no means buy these if you're just looking headphones to sit about the house. These are for gym use. They're comfortable sweat resistant a the clarity is excellent but not that loud. Perfect for gym use though.
customer_reviews.author: Metaaaaaalllllll! 💀☠️🤘🏻

customer_reviews.title: Boom sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: Premium quality! Another great product from Sony, and the sound is really...boom, for such a small device! Very fashionable as well, not necessarily only for the gym. As always easy to connect and good BT range. Love it. Plus the pouch is a great addition. Thanks, Sony
customer_reviews.author: SDS

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but annoying wire!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great but the wire is really annoying because it just dangles and pulls on the ear buds.
customer_reviews.author: Secret Squiggly

customer_reviews.title: excellent, but would have expected to last longer
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound, excellent fit, battery warning only when it is too late to recharge, after 1.5 years of daily use, the cable connecting the two parts had a loose connection
customer_reviews.author: ldent

customer_reviews.title: broke after 10 months!
customer_reviews.text: Left earphone socket would fall off after 4 months but still worked fine. 10 months later left ear completely stopped working! Really like them for running though, shame they have broken
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy, 4 stars simply because the clip behind came off; but the quality of sound is fantastic
customer_reviews.author: B. Ankah

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally like in ear headphones as they hurt my ears but these are great. So comfortable and snug they really feel secure. Also fits comfortably with glasses and the battery life is great. The sound is great with plenty of bass.
customer_reviews.author: stephen hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Sony wireless earphone are truly awsome they really work as discribed and the bass is really deep
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfekt
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfekt - in action and even if you sleep - excellent sound, easy and quick connection to a phone all, no problem with Batterie capacity, easy to clean. This is from my point of view the best equipment of this Type presntly available.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: The same headphones in a different colour to the ones my wife already has.
customer_reviews.author: Uncle Albert

customer_reviews.title: battery life is very good, no problems so far
customer_reviews.text: I use them constantly. battery life is very good, no problems so far. good sound
customer_reviews.author: Likmjk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but not the right fit for me
customer_reviews.text: I really can't fault the product, the sound was really good and the product had a high quality feel to it. However it didn't fit in my ears very well especially if I was running fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound, extremely comfortable and securely fixed in place. Very good value.
customer_reviews.author: Snapser

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t praise up enough , great sound , great battery life , ideal for exercise or work
customer_reviews.author: andrew peace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product do not hesitate to buy it very difficult to buy this quality at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Faulty power switch,
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure how long we have for manufacture warranty...But you will not succeed returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: AC MALONTIE

customer_reviews.title: Not cheap but great sound and they work
customer_reviews.text: So not a cheap pair of blue tooth head phones but the work and are still working. The fit is good and the different size in ear pieces will enhance the sound quality. They do look a bit clumsy and as if they are quite bulky but once on they are great. I have used them for 20k runs and in the gym for weights etc., no slipping or rubbing.
customer_reviews.author: davidiafrica

customer_reviews.title: Please read.
customer_reviews.text: Good sound however I have 2 pairs which only last 6 months at a time. Sony repaired one then wanted to charge me £68.80 for a repair outside of warranty but that's ridiculous as a brand new pair on Amazon is £62. Honestly do not purchase these or anything from Sony with a 1 year warranty. I emailed customer service/complaints and they will shoot you down without blinking. Not very helpful or reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Psykick

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sports earphones.
customer_reviews.text: Once you get used to the strange looks you get at the gym, you will find these to be brilliant. Great sound, easy connection, plenty of battery life and stay on well. Used for jogging and weight training. Just a shame you still need the phone near by for the music (obviously). Would be nice to have a small memory for some tunes but maybe the next gen sports earphones will have that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. W. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but full of problems
customer_reviews.text: Usb charge socket failed within 3 months of purchase. Not a great fit around the ear. No way to fast forward tracks. Only allows skip track. No way to check battery level, you only get told "battery low" just before it turns off.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Booth

customer_reviews.title: actually felt like it just vanished
customer_reviews.text: Initially these worked well. After 2 months, the on/off button under the rubber cover stopped working ,actually felt like it just vanished, rendering them unable to be turned on or off. I had used them carefully- never got wet or anything despite they are washable. Excellent Amazon service giving a refund as i lost trust in them. Pity, but there you go.
customer_reviews.author: wildstyle

customer_reviews.title: Both aren't brilliant. Sound quality is okay
customer_reviews.text: Sadly can't give them more than 3 stars. These are my second Sony bluetooth wireless earphones which I've returned. Both aren't brilliant. Sound quality is okay, but suffer from a hissing sound. Not worth £120.
customer_reviews.author: nads205

customer_reviews.title: Great wireless headphones
customer_reviews.text: Given these as a gift by my sons for using at the gym. They are really good, fit my ears well, have a nice tone and make the whole experience so much better. Not used them over a long period of time so not sure how long the charge lasts though.
customer_reviews.author: E Hartop

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate, get them now
customer_reviews.text: Just absolutely awesome. So comfortable and secure, great sound. Work brilliantly with the apple watch. Well worth the money, by far the best sports headphones I've ever used, and I've been through a fair few.
customer_reviews.author: Iggy Poop

customer_reviews.title: Good for aerial stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality for active activities; not that good for yoga or other activities where you are leaning down or close to the ground as the sound tend to cut a lot. It stay good in your ear tho; I mean I do aerial circus and they didn't drop until today. The thingy on the back of the wire to make it tighter doesn't work really good; in fact I already lost mine bit if you feel is too long just knot it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good whilst it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Using these right now and they are extremely glitchy, can't even get 10 seconds of clean audio anymore. I had they these delivered on the 1st of December and was expecting good things from Sony but they are ready for the bin.... literally
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Not great sound, and uncomfortable to wear,
customer_reviews.text: Very poor sound. Could not hear any Bass, let alone any Extra Bass!! Awkward to wear with glasses, very uncomfortable, Will keep to the over ears style,
customer_reviews.author: rfuk

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: To much base very painful in ear hard to get use to
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely rubbish sound quality and not very comfortable - a complete waste of money. Also won't pair with my iPad. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: KEM

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: The sound equality, of course, I'm comparing them my wired £300 in ear headphones, is poor. The Bluetooth connection is intermittent when cycling. The ear cushions are cheap and inadequate.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

product_meta.title: Sony MDR-XB80BS Extra Bass Bluetooth Washable Sports In-Ear Headphones - Black
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:BlackSony MDR-XB80BS Extra Bass Bluetooth Washable Sports In-Ear Headphones - Black.

BOX CONTAINS
MDR-XB80BS
Carrying Pouch
Headphone cable Length Adjuster
USB Cable
Earbuds
Warranty Card
Operating Instructions
Reference Guide
feature_bullets: Improve your sports performance while listening to your favourite punchy deep bass tunes
Stable fit and freedom without tangled cables: Secure-fit with ear hook style
High quality music transmission via Bluetooth using Sony proprietary technology (LDAC)

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
